Wordle Challenge

How to Play ?

The goal of the game is to guess the five letter word in six tries or less. Use the hints from your guesses to help yourself in subsequent tries.

Examples:-

W
O
R
D
L

Gray indicates the letter is not present in the word.

W
O
R
D
L

Yellow indicates the letter is present in the word. Just not in the correct position.

W
O
R
D
L

Green indicates the letter is present and in the correct position in the word.

Q W E R T Y U I O P
S A D F G H J K L
ENTER Z X C V B N M
